channel.title: Focus Like A Laser Beam
channel.description: A series of webcast conversations with Lisa Haneberg about what inspired her to write this book and how leaders can use her techniques to energize the work place.
channel.itunes:author: Lisa Haneberg
channel.itunes:summary: In Focus Like a Laser Beam, acclaimed management consultant and business blogger Lisa Haneberg offers business leaders a new way to direct their focus that, like a laser beam, is direct, fast, and on track.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Work is crazy, busy, and demanding! What if you get everything done without burning out?

item.title: Two Weeks To A Breakthrough
item.description:
I have declared 2007 the Year of the Breakthrough! What this means is that I am committed to catalyzing as many breakthroughs as possible. This video brings together an amazing song called Breakthrough and simple and inspiring visuals about how to improve personal success.
I created this video to inspire more conversations about generating breakthroughs and to compliment the work I have done with my books and talks.
Want to learn more about how to generate breakthroughs? Join me! Beginning on May 20, I will head out from Seattle on my trusty motorcycle Hazel (short for Purple Haze). Together we will drive south to San Diego, east to Atlanta, north to New York City and then west back home to Seattle. The trip will be about 10,000 miles and I will be stopping and talking about breakthroughs all along the way. Am I stopping in your town?
Can't wait? Pick up a copy of Two Weeks to a Breakthrough. Thanks for your support.

item.title: Manager's Morning Mantra

item.title: 10 Ways to Generate Breakthrough Results
item.description: 10 simple tehniques you can use to zoom toward your goals. Presented by Lisa Haneberg.

item.title: Stop Mulitasking Webcast
item.description: In this brief (9min.) webcast, I discuss the focusing technique of chunking - an alternative to multitasking.
item.itunes:author: Lisa Haneberg
item.itunes:summary: In this brief (9min.) webcast, I discuss the focusing technique of chunking - an alternative to multitasking.
